title: Account hacked and banned
body:
Change your password boys (and girls). Some fuckwit is going around logging into people's accounts and getting them banned.

Noticed on Monday that my RP was lower that what I though I had left but brushed it off as me accidentally making a purchase. Fast forward to this morning, I logged in and it said I was in a game. Apparently someone hacked into my account and played two ranked games - no biggie.

Logged in just now and said my account was banned for using a third party software. Wouldn't have really cared less but I've embarrassingly spent quite a bit on money in the last 6 years or so on this account so it would be a damn shame to lose it.

replies.body:
In case you aren't aware, you can usually recover such an account (and have any actions like purchases taken under compromise reset) by  following through the account recovery process with support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

As a side note, there are a few things that can make account recovery impossible or unlikely, like if you have a history of sharing your account.
